properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO, CATEGORY_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NAME, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') CREATE_DATE FROM TB_BOARD JOIN TB_CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE TB_BOARD.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT BOARD_NO, CATEGORY_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') CREATE_DATE, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NO, BOARD_CONTENT FROM TB_BOARD LEFT JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) JOIN TB_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND TB_BOARD.STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO TB_BOARD ( BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, CATEGORY_NO, MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_BOARDNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, SYSDATE, ?, ? )
UPDATE TB_BOARD SET CATEGORY_NO = ?, BOARD_TITLE = ?, BOARD_CONTENT = ? WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE TB_BOARD SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
